text:
@GOPChairwoman @realDonaldTrump These aren't newly created jobs! It's laid off people getting their jobs back.
Had it not been for his inept handling of the coronavirus to start with, those jobs never would have been lost! He doesn't get credit for a comeback of jobs he's responsible for the loss of!
